title: The Favourite
short_cast: Olivia Colman, Emma Stone, Rachel Weisz, Nicholas Hoult, Joe Alwyn, James Smith, Mark Gatiss, Jenny Rainsford
cast: Olivia Colman, Emma Stone, Rachel Weisz, Nicholas Hoult, Joe Alwyn, James Smith, Mark Gatiss, Jenny Rainsford
genre: British, LGBTQ Movies, Drama Movies, Comedy Movies, Independent Movies, Period Pieces
desc: As an ailing, erratic Queen Anne loses her grip on a kingdom at war, her closest confidant tangles with a wily young rival for the ruler's affections.
